Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes

Class SoileRouter

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes.SoileRouter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElementRouter, ParticipationRouter, StudyRouter, UserRouter
public class SoileRouter extends Object
Base class which provides Error Handling for Soile Routers handling some common errors.
Author:
Thomas Pfau
